statements: SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, author FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, code FROM smart_contracts WHERE author = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE author = 'Bob' ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT contract_name, author FROM smart_contracts WHERE author = 'Alice' AND code ILIKE '%transaction%';
SELECT contract_name, author, code FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE author='Alice';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS contract_count FROM smart_contracts GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT contract_name, code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT network_name, network_type FROM blockchain_networks;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT network_name, network_url FROM blockchain_networks WHERE network_type = 'Public';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM blockchain_networks ORDER BY network_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_id FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM contract_owners WHERE owner_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT deployment_id, deployment_date FROM contract_deployments ORDER BY deployment_date ASC;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT * FROM contract_owners WHERE owner_name = 'Alice';
SELECT contract_name, deployment_date FROM smart_contracts LEFT JOIN contract_deployments ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_deployments.contract_id;
SELECT owner_name, contract_name FROM contract_owners INNER JOIN smart_contracts ON contract_owners.contract_id = smart_contracts.contract_id;
SELECT MAX(deployment_id) AS max_deployment_id FROM contract_deployments;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id > 3;
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM contract_owners INNER JOIN smart_contracts ON contract_owners.contract_id = smart_contracts.contract_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id > 3 ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT c.contract_name, cm.metadata_key, cm.metadata_value FROM smart_contracts c INNER JOIN contract_metadata cm ON c.contract_id = cm.contract_id WHERE cm.metadata_key = 'version';

SELECT ct.transaction_id, ct.transaction_hash, ct.timestamp, c.contract_name FROM contract_transactions ct INNER JOIN smart_contracts c ON ct.contract_id = c.contract_id WHERE ct.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY ct.timestamp DESC;
SELECT co.owner_name, c.contract_name FROM contract_owners co INNER JOIN smart_contracts c ON co.contract_id = c.contract_id WHERE co.owner_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY co.owner_name;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name = 'Example Contract';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contract_dependencies WHERE dependency_version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT contract_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM contract_logs GROUP BY contract_id;
SELECT c.contract_id, c.contract_name, d.dependency_name FROM smart_contracts c INNER JOIN contract_dependencies d ON c.contract_id = d.dependency_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contract_name, contract_id FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT c.contract_id, c.contract_name, d.deployed_at FROM smart_contracts c JOIN contract_deployments d ON c.contract_id = d.contract_id;

SELECT c.contract_name, d.deployed_at, l.log_message FROM smart_contracts c JOIN contract_deployments d ON c.contract_id = d.contract_id JOIN contract_logs l ON l.contract_id = c.contract_id WHERE d.deployed_at > '2022-01-01';
